org.ajgl.collision

Class QuadTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ajgl.collision.QuadTree

  • public class QuadTree
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to be a 2d simplification object that helps with object collision.
    Author:
    Tyler Bucher

        public QuadTree(int xSize,
                int ySize,
                int maxSize)
        A Simplified QuadTree used for efficient 2D collision Detection.
        Parameters:
        xSize - - The horizontal size of the QuadTree
        ySize - - The vertical size of the QuadTree
        maxSize - - The Maximum size of the QuadTree

        gameObject - - The GameObejct to be removed

      • updateObject

        public void updateObject(GameObject gameObject)
        Updates an object in all nodes. If the object is not in the QuadTree to start with this method will add it.
        Parameters:
        gameObject - - The GameObejct to be updated

      • contains

        public boolean contains(GameObject gameObject)
        Checks to see if the QuadTree contains a certain object.
        Parameters:
        gameObject - - The object to be checked
        Returns:
        True if this QuadTree contains the object
